Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-5088 affecting package qemu for versions less than 6.2.0-21
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-5088 affecting package qemu for versions less than 6.2.0-21. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package qemu is earlier than 6.2.0-21, affected by CVE-2023-5088
